results.name: a(2n-1) = n+2, a(2n) = smallest number requiring n+2 letters in English.
comment: Uses number forms containing "and"; that is, "one hundred and one" rather than "one hundred one". - _Sean A. Irvine_, Oct 20 2018
results.author: Jacques Haubrich (jhaubrich(AT)freeler.nl)
